comment.author: 64264902@N07
comment._content: Private Varley was from Barnoldswick, Yorkshire.

comment.author: 69662531@N05
comment._content:

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/64264902@N07] @Travis1942, could you tell us where you got this information from? thank you.

comment.author: 69717788@N04
comment._content: Named on Cenotaph in BARNOLDSWICK, YORKSHIRE. www.cpgw.org.uk/craven_war_memorial.cfm?mCode=BARNOLDS&am...

comment.author: 63191264@N00
comment._content:
The 1901 census shows John Varley [b. about 1891] living with his parents Thomas E [b.1864, Barrowford, Lancs] and Alice [b.1863, Burnley, Lancs] and his older sister, Ethel [b.1886, Barrowford, Lancs] at 63D Gisburn Road, Barrowford, Lancs. His father’s employment is recorded as “Fried fish & chip dealer (Coffee House)” this address possibly demolished. The address at 24 Garnett Street is certainly demolished although other properties in the street remain and are still occupied.
His marital home at 22 Clifford Street is still extant, below is a screen capture from Google Earth Street View. Click on the picture for a large view.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/liits/6347298094/in/photostream]

comment._content: FreeBMD Thomas Edward Varley birth reg 3rd qr 1863 Burnley 8e 206 IGI familysearch.org Thomas Edward Varley, son of John and Elizabeth Christening: 16 AUG 1863 Barrowford, Lancashire, England Batch No.: Dates: Source Call No.: C162331 1840 - 1900 1471022 Thomas Varley is age 17 at time of 1881 Census and living in Barrowford Household: John VARLEY Head M Male 48 Barrowfd, Lancashire, England Cotton Mule Spinner Maria VARLEY Wife M Female 54 Colne, Lancashire, England House Keeper Thomas VARLEY Son U Male 17 Barrowfd, Lancashire, England Cotton Mule Peicer Henry VARLEY Son Male 14 Barrowfd, Lancashire, England Cotton Mule Peicer Elizebth VARLEY Daur Female 9 Barrowfd, Lancashire, England Scholar Source Information: Dwelling Park Halstead Lane Census Place Barrowford Booth, Lancashire, England Family History Library Film 1341998 Public Records Office Reference RG11 Piece / Folio 4165 / 98 Page Number 26 FreeBMD Varley Thomas Edward marr reg 2nd qr 1884 to Alice Tatham Burnley 8e 433 Ethel VARLEY birth reg 4th qr 1885 Burnley 8e 274 John VARLEY birth reg 3rd qr 1890 or 1st qr 1891 in Burnley John VARLEY marr reg 4th qr 1913 to Alice PLUMMER Wetherby 9a 249 Quite possible that John and Alice Varley had a son Frederick G Varley Frederick G birth reg 3rd qr 1915 mother Plummer Coventry 6d 1223 Fredrick George Varley, born Jul 06 1915 in Coventry, England, died May 27 1995 in Coventry, England www.tribalpages.com/family-tree/derekvarley#VARLEY_
